## Prep for docking

WE weant to produce a protein-only PDB file and a drug only PFB file.


```{r}
library(bio3d)

# download the PDB file, will show on the right side bar
get.pdb("1hsg")
```

```{r}
pdb <- read.pdb("1hsg.pdb")
```
